about_the_game:
This Extra Character Pack for 100% Orange Juice adds a new playable dual character - the idol pair Sham & Sora (Cuties) finally takes to the stage! The new character pair includes an announcer voice, and comes ready to put on a live concert!

Sora & Sham (Cuties) Character Pack includes:
  • A unique new dual character: The Cuties play as one unit
  • Sora is voiced by Maruyama Miki
  • Sham is voiced by Fukuyama Saori
  • A unique new Hyper Card puts on a live concert!

The new character duo is designed by Orange_Juice’s original staff for the game’s English Steam release, with character and hyper card art by Hono.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 2.0GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Direct3D compatible video card with 128MB memory or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
